brief: Returns the first value in an array that passes a test
description: The predicate is called for each value in the first array in values until true is returned, then that value is returned.

parameters.description: This is a boolean function that is called to determine if an array entry passes the test.
parameters.name: predicate

parameters.description: These are the values passed to the predicate with the exception that the first array is passed as the single current value from the array. At least one array is required.
parameters.name: values

returns.description: The first value that passes the test is returned.
